name: pouchdb-show
description: A PouchDB plug-in that allows you to re-use your CouchDB show functions on the client side.
author: Marten de Vries

scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s Show -g es3ify -o dist/pouchdb-show.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js; cd dist; uglifyjs pouchdb-show.js -mc > pouchdb-show.min.js
